replies.body: Hey Fam. We are experiencing a slight delay with activating Your Shop. ETA next 30-45 minutes. It's coming! Apologies!
hey, something must be wrong... i got 6 skins for champs i never played, some i dont even own. is that supposed to happen? never happened before...
Yeah I am super disappointed in my offers. Nothing for champs I play. I guess the discount bot isn't too smart :(
same here i got 6 skins for champ i rarely play and 4 of them are for 2 of the same champs
They must have taken it down in response to all of these posts, because I still don't see it.

Me and my firends on EUW cant see the shop either ;) seems rito cant fix it in the called 30 - 45 minutes {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}  good job rito good job{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}  pls just name us times u can handle so we dont need to sit here and wait even if the time u told us passed by for about 20 mis...

> [{quoted}](name=Blaubartvv3,realm=EUW,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=EJBvUZGs,comment-id=001c00030001000000020000,timestamp=2017-05-18T20:29:30.422+0000)
>
> Me and my firends on EUW cant see the shop either ;) seems rito cant fix it in the called 30 - 45 minutes {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}  good job rito good job{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}  pls just name us times u can handle so we dont need to sit here and wait even if the time u told us passed by for about 20 mis...

Or you should pay attention to the fact they said they are deactivating it till further notice to fix it
Same Here, 4/5 I dont even own. 2/5 I NEVER played.
Hey Ao Oni and others. We are investigating this right now. We're going to turn the feature off and fix this. Stay tuned and apologies.
Thanks again for the update! Will the people who've already opened their shops get a reset?
Yep, complete reset.
Based Rito coming to the rescue {{item:3026}}

The wait for all these offers for characters i've no plan on buying :(

This must be someone else's shop.
Same here. I got 6 offers for champions I almost never play.
same, I got skins for 6 champs I don't even own
same here
I got Pheonix Quinn for 500 RP!! WHAT A STEAL!! Too bad I don't own or ever want to own this champion..
I don't own any of the champs I got skins for lol how does this happen
Same, all of mine are for champions I haven't even played once :(
same here xd. I play adc anad support, they given me discounts for top and mid laners xd

same exact story for me.. where is my primetime draven skin

or ANY other adc or support

I got top laners only

Yeah, I've got 6 different champ skins on sale, and only 1 of them have I played in the past like 200+ games (2, if you count Nasus on ARAM)

Like, no offense Riot, but how is this "My Store"?
Same

Ya super disappointed that I only got one skin for a champ that I play! It is Panda Teemo which is cool but all of the past shops that I have looked at were filled with discounts on skins that I actually play! Like seriously never played some of these champs! Why {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I got exactly 1 really mediocre 20% off deal for exactly 1 champ I play once in a blue moon. I waited so long for Your Shop to return and I feel like I essentially got nothing for the wait. It's not _your_ shop if it doesn't have skins for champs you play! I never had this problem with previous iterations of Your Shop. Disappointed...
This should now be working on the NA servers. We are working through the other regions right now! Your deals should reset and you should have relevant deals now!
My shop wont even open, like the screen comes up but it never stops loading, is it bugged for anyone else too?
Maybe they accidentally put it on the legacy client :')
Am I the only one who got skins for champions I never play or never have played?
Is "Your Shop" bugged at the moment? Mine is just continuously loading...
Well its up now... and I got 6 skins for champions that I don't own and have never played more than just once in a bot game... thaaaanks riot
Is it up yet? It's past the time that it said it would be open, but I can't find it.
my shop isnt loading
Had to wait an extra 30 minutes to get skins on champs i never play
wtf i just got six skins for champs ive never played im dissapointed ):
Got 6 skins for champs that I've never even played, and they're all 750/975 skins. Wtf riot?
My shop is just continuously loading and never shows anything. is anyone else having this problem??
Rito why you do this. I got skins for champions I don't play. I thought discountbot was supposed to handpick skins for each player. Obviously the algorithm is off-kilter to say the least.
I think Discountbot needs a tune up to be actually thoughtful because the skins it offered me are absolute donkey dingle.{{item:3073}}

"We’ve settled in to our exciting new location in the updated client..." 

Where dis.
Waiting for it. Nice to have it back.
My Shop doesn't load anything in the NA server

I FOUND IT
!!! Reload the client
And I got skins for champs I don't even use..
Maybe if I keep logging in and out again it will appear
my shop isnt loading

Hi Riot! I dont know if this was posted already, but My Shop is taking forever to actually load up when I click on the button, and then when it all does load, I am not able to click on the sales themselves.
I just got 6 skin sales for champions I have never played, in lanes that I play nearly 10% of the time or less. Please tell me this is a mistake
I love getting skins that are trash ):
